definition: to freeze/to feel very cold/aspic or jelly

sentences.english: The factors affecting the safety of quick-frozen food and the quality control measures were discussed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 該文探討了影響速凍食品安全的因素和質量控制措施。

sentences.english: An edible factory with annual production of 2000 tons is planned to be constructed.
sentences.chinese: 擬建山野菜速凍保鮮廠一座，年加工能力2000噸。

sentences.english: The nutritional and convenient quick-frozen food was favored by the general consumers.
sentences.chinese: 營養方便的速凍食品深受廣大消費者青睞。

sentences.english: We have frozen dumplings again become a hot and sour soup?
sentences.chinese: 我們有速凍水餃，再做個酸辣湯吧？

sentences.english: Now, with quick-freezing process, gnocchi appeared on the store.
sentences.chinese: 現在有了速凍工藝，湯糰纔出現在商店裏。

sentences.english: Green food quick-frozen the best breed.
The island Haikang aquatic product development Limited company, sells ea…
sentences.chinese: 青島海康水產發展有限公司，主營各種進口速凍海蔘。

sentences.english: The freezing-law and quick-frozen technology of taros were studied in this thesis.
sentences.chinese: 對芋頭的凍結規律與速凍工藝進行了研究。

sentences.english: Meatball in cooling groove can be directly into a frozen after cooling hang ice frozen workshop.
sentences.chinese: 肉丸在冷卻槽內冷卻後可直接進入速凍車間掛冰冷凍。

sentences.english: Rub it outside the beef, roll it and freeze.
sentences.chinese: 把它塗抹在牛柳的外面，把牛柳捲起後速凍。

sentences.english: No "healthy" frozen whole grain waffle should have hydrogenated oils. Ever.
sentences.chinese: 健康的速凍全穀物麪包裏是不應該含有氫化油的。

sentences.english: In China, frozen TV dinners are largely a foreign concept.
sentences.chinese: 在中國，購買速凍電視餐幾乎是一個全新的外來概念。

sentences.english: Quick-frozen food with original taste is easy to prepare and cook, and availaBle for four seasons' enjoyment.
sentences.chinese: 速凍食品，原湯原味，燒煮方便，可供四季享用。

sentences.english: Mainly discusses concepts of food cold chain and fast-frozen food.
sentences.chinese: 本文重點論述了食品冷藏鏈和速凍食品的概念。

sentences.english: Frozen or pre-packaged foods ruin your taste buds and are often unhealthy.
sentences.chinese: 速凍食品會破壞你的味蕾，而且不健康。

sentences.english: Tunnel freezer is a simple structure, highly efficient freezing equipment.
sentences.chinese: 隧道速凍機是一種結構較爲簡單的高效速凍裝置。

definition: soft mixed vegetable and meat roll-up
loose goods/goods sold open/draft (of beer, as opposed to bottled)
